title: Spacious 1Bedroom 1 bath Apartment Available in San Lorenzo
posting_body: ['San Lorenzo  CA 94580  $1995.00/mo', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Sq Footage: 887 sq ft.', 'Bedrooms:  1 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Parking: 1 Car Garage', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit: $1995', 'Pets Policy: flexible', 'Laundry: Washer and Dryer on site', 'Property Type: Bottom Unit', 'DESCRIPTION', '________________________________________', 'Available Immediately, $1995 rent, Downstairs Unit Apt, 1 Spacious bedrooms, 1 bathrooms, Completely Remodeled .', 'Newly installed hardwood floors, brand new tiled bathrooms, huge living room, and new blinds, freshly painted, ceiling fans.', '1 car garage.', 'Gardening & garbage included', 'Call for showing:', 'show contact info', 'ask for Eli', 'Please call to schedule a appointment to comply with social distancing. .', 'Please DO NOT DISTURB the tenants.', 'Nicely landscaped front yard.', 'RENTAL FEATURES', '________________________________________', '•\tLiving room', '•\tSpacious Bedroom and bath', '•\tRange / Oven', '•\tWasher and Dryer  On  site', '•\tGarbage disposal', '•\tRefrigerator', '•\t Dining area', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', 'Nicely landscaped & professionally maintained, front yard.', 'Side yard.', 'Very close to freeways and shopping, colleges.']
